fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £300 Spend New Year in romantic Florence. A three-night break from 31 December costs £289 with Cities Direct (0870 442 1844). This includes flights from Stansted with B&B at the three-star Delle Nazioni. Under £400 A 14-night Christmas and New Year break to Lanzarote is a perfect antidote to the winter blues. Relax on the beach and enjoy your stay at the four-star self-catering Sands Beach Villas. Departs 23 December from Glasgow for £399pp with Future Travel (01752 668385). Under £900 Euro Gay Ski Week takes place in La Plagne, France from 15-22 January. Book a week's package with Impulse Holidays (0870 405 5040). They offer all- inclusive accommodation at the Terra Nova Hotel, return flights from London Gatwick and ski guides for the first three days. Also a six-day lift pass, ski/boot or snowboard hire and free entry to the 'Bleu Night' nightclub for £845 pp. Under £1,000 Celebrate New Year Vietnamese style with Carefree World (01293 527700). Stay four nights in Ho Chi Minh City and three in Hanoi for £949 pp. Accommodation is included as are return flights from Heathrow. Offer ends January 2005. Under £1,300 Spend Christmas in the lap of luxury at an English country house in the Cotswolds. The Lygon Arms (01386 852255) is hosting a three-night stay with black tie dinners and traditional Christmas lunch from £1,290 for two people. The price includes breakfast, afternoon tea and traditional festive lunch.
